simplesect.title: Xlib Compose Keys for ru_RU.UTF-8
simplesect.para: Applications using Xlib input handling should recognize these compose key sequences in locales using the ru_RU.UTF-8 compose table.

This compose table includes the non-conflicting entries from: /home/simon/GIT/buildroot-k3-current/output/host/usr/share/X11/locale/en_US.UTF-8/Compose. Those entries are not shown here - see those charts for the included key sequences.

para.emphasis: This compose table defines no sequences of its own.
